description.desc1: Creates Osc messages from a stream of messages

send address.descript: the address in front of the sent parameters

fuse.descript:
fuses the address with the parameter. i.e. 
unfused: /osc/address parameter value 
fused: /osc/address/parameter value

filter.descript: uses filter. if filter is enabled, only messages that match a filter will be sent, all others will perish.

scan for messages.descript: when this button is pressed, the node will scan the messages and provides the filters with a selection

matching filter.descript: if the message matches the string it will pass.

use replace.descript: the parameter of the message will be replaced with the replace string

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
